subtitle: This favourite creamy sauce has been spiced up with a little nutmeg and cloves.

method.text: Place the milk, onion, pepper corns, nutmeg and cloves in a saucepan. Slowly bring to the boil. Remoe frm the heat. Leave to stand for 20 min.
Strain the mixture into a clean saucepan. Stir in the breadcrumbs. Stir in the breadcrumbs and seasoning. Simmer gently for 15-20 min, stirring occasionally until thickened slightly.
Stir the butter into the sauce until melted. Spoon into a warmed serving dish. Garnish with a spirinkling of nutmeg.

title: Spiced bread sauce
